verses.name: Revelation 16:8
verses.text: And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.

verses.name: Revelation 16:9
verses.text: And men were scorched with great heat, and blasphemed the name of God, which hath power over these plagues: and they repented not to give him glory.

verses.name: Revelation 16:10
verses.text: And the fifth angel poured out his vial upon the seat of the beast; and his kingdom was full of darkness; and they gnawed their tongues for pain,

verses.name: Revelation 16:11
verses.text: And blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores, and repented not of their deeds.
